uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.utils

Class Constants

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.pride.utilities.data.utils.Constants

  • public final class Constants
extends Object
    Constants contain a set of functions for SpectraData validation and also the constants used by mzTab and mzIdentML to reference the Ids and type file formats.
    Author:
    Yasset Perez-Riverol, Rui Wang

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Constants.SpecFileFormat
      An enum of the supported spectra file types
      static class  Constants.SpecIdFormat
      Supported id format used in the spectrum file.

    • Method Detail

      • getSpecFileFormat

        public static Constants.SpecFileFormat getSpecFileFormat(String fileFormat)
        Retrieve the Spectrum File format for an specific fileformat.
        Parameters:
        fileFormat - file format such mgf ms2, mzid or other file formats
        Returns:
        the SpectrumFile format such as MZXML or PKL

      • getSpecFileFormatFromLocation

        public static Constants.SpecFileFormat getSpecFileFormatFromLocation(String path)
        Return the SpectrumFile format for an specific path such as: /myppath/spectrum_file.mgf
        Parameters:
        path - the specific path
        Returns:
        the SpectrumFile format such as MZXML or PKL
